content: CAN YOU GET APPAREL NOT LISTED ON YOUR SITE?
Chances are yes! We work with distributors all over the country, so if you don't see what you want let us know and we'll do our best to make it happen!
HOW CAN I TRACK MY ORDER?
We will provide you a FedEx tracking number once your product has been scanned for shipment.
CAN I ADD TO AN ORDER AFTER IT'S BEEN PROCESSED?
We can't guarantee it for every order but if you contact us the same business day the order closes, we will do our best to adjust.
ARE YOU LICENSED WITH MY ORGANIZATION AND SCHOOL?
We are licensed with nearly all Greek organizations and over 120+ Colleges & Universities. To view a full list of our licensed schools check them out here
FAQ's
HOW DO I START AN APPAREL DESIGN?
Use our easy online proof request system or contact us at 800-472-3269. One of our custom apparel professionals will help you get started!
IS THERE A MINIMUM ORDER REQUIREMENT?

Yes, we require a minimum of 36 items for all screen-printed apparel orders that do not require custom artwork. If your art design requires customization, a minimum order of 50 items may apply. All embroidery items require a minimum of 36 items.
IS ARTWORK FREE?

We love providing great new designs for all of our customers, but there are certain situations where a refundable art deposit might be required. Your account manager will contact you if this might be necessary.
HOW DO I GET A QUOTE?
We'll provide you an accurate price quote for your order each time we send you a completed proof. If you'd like an estimate before you have a design, please contact us at campus@grafcow.com.
WHAT ARE YOUR SHIPPING OPTIONS?
We offer various shipping options, including standard, expedited, and overnight. You can choose the one that suits your needs and budget.
DO YOU OFFER BULK DISCOUNTS?
Absolutely! We provide discounts for bulk orders. The more you order, the more you save. Contact us for specific pricing details.
WHAT'S THE TURNAROUND TIME FOR CUSTOM DESIGNS?
Custom designs usually take a bit longer, but we work efficiently. Expect a turnaround time of 7-10 business days for most custom orders.
CAN I SEE SAMPLES OF YOUR WORK?
Of course! We have a portfolio of our previous work. Just let us know what you're interested in, and we'll gladly share some samples.
DO YOU OFFER INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING?
Yes, we do! We offer international shipping to customers worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times may vary based on location.
WHAT PAYMENT METHODS DO YOU ACCEPT?
We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, and more. You can choose the one that's most convenient for you during checkout.
WHAT'S YOUR RETURN POLICY?
Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of delivery. Please visit our Returns page for detailed instructions.
DO YOU OFFER SIZING CHARTS?
Yes, we provide sizing charts for most of our apparel items. You can find them on the product page under the 'Size Guide' section.
HOW CAN I CONTACT CUSTOMER SUPPORT?
You can reach our customer support team by emailing support@yourcompany.com or by calling our toll-free number at 1-800-123-4567.
ARE THERE ANY CURRENT PROMOTIONS OR DISCOUNTS?
We often have special promotions and discounts. Check our website or subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on the latest offers.
WHAT MATERIALS ARE YOUR PRODUCTS MADE OF?
Our products are made from high-quality materials such as cotton, polyester, and blends. Specific material information can be found on the product pages.
DO YOU OFFER CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS?
Yes, we offer customization options for many of our products. You can add your logo, text, or artwork to create a unique look.
CAN I CANCEL AN ORDER?
You can cancel an order if it hasn't been processed yet. Please contact our customer support team as soon as possible to request a cancellation.
DO YOU HAVE A SIZE GUARANTEE?
We strive to provide accurate sizing information, but if you receive an item that doesn't fit, please contact us, and we'll assist you with a replacement or return.
WHAT'S YOUR SHIPPING POLICY?
Our shipping policy outlines delivery times, shipping methods, and costs. You can find all the details on our Shipping page.
